welcome: Welcome to the world of Pax, %USER%.  It's always disorienting - the locals like to say that the Celestial Winds that brought you here are an enigma.  But you will find close friends, hated enemies, and many many adventures ahead.  You may be wondering what's next now that you've landed.  You can of course check out our forums at http://s4.zetaboards.com/RP_Pax/index/ .  Here you can find character profiles, ongoing posted RP's, and some general insanity.  You also don't have to stay alone here.  You can invite your friends! Don't forget to deposit your Sanity into the skull shaped baskets - it will do you no good here - and prepare for your new life on Pax.
random: %USER% are teleported into Deep Space.||A vial of Pixie Punch appears in front of %USER%!||A horde of zombies attack! CP-ception.||Everyone hugs!||Another %USER% appears right next to %USER%!||Tox pokes %USER%!||%USER% find a can of Sausages.||Everyone in %CHANNEL% recieves a bottle of Pixie Punch||%USER% is quickly dragged into a closet.||%USER% is healed completely
setting: Nottingham,GB|It is a %TEMP% %TIME% at the encempment with %WEATHER%.||Hausach,GE|Although %TEMP% at the Corrupted Forest, the %TIME% %WEATHER% cannot hide the foreboding sense of doom...||Huntsville,AL|It is %TIME% at the Temple of Insanity, and the %TEMP% %WEATHER% cannot put a damper on things.||Isachsen,CA|The %TEMP% %WEATHER% on Kata greets you as you walk outside at %TIME%.||SanFransisco,US|In spite of the %WEATHER%, you approach the Wreck of the Laotzchy on this %TEMP% %TIME%.||PortAngeles,US|It is %TIME% at the Campfire, and you gather around it in the %TEMP% %WEATHER%.||Westhaven-Moonstone,US|You find yourself on an %TIME% stroll through a huge forest of red trees, enjoying the %TEMP% %WEATHER%.||PointLay,AK|You enter the Village of Anos on a %TEMP% %TIME%, seeking rest from the %WEATHER%.||InyoCounty,US|You stand just outside the Corrupted Cave, the %TEMP% %TIME% %WEATHER% giving you no comfort as you prepare to enter...||Edmonton,AB|The city of Yeg bussels in the %TIME%, where the %TEMP% %WEATHER% makes no difference.||Vlodivostok,RU|In Spite of the %TEMP% %WEATHER%, the H&H is doing a fine business at %TIME%||Chukhung,NP|Standing on The Pass, you see both planets to either side of you, and deep space unfold before you...||Compiègne,FR|We are pleased to welcome to the Moot Hall this fine %TIME%. It is quite a regal looking place with a large round table, to give the impression that all representatives are equal.||Atlanta,GA|Before you stretches a massive, yawning cavern full of green jelly. Anything that falls in bounces right back up, just as high and equally as fast.
